articles.author: Phil Helsel, Chloe Melas
articles.title: Hollywood writers can return to work after union and studios reach agreement to end strike - NBC News
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America strike that has disrupted programming and other operations for Hollywood media companies will come to an end Wednesday, after both sides agreed to a tentative deal, the union said.
articles.content:
The deal also includes increases in minimum weekly pay rates and minimum numbers of writers, according to a summary of the "memorandum of agreement" on the writers guild website.
Actors are also on … [+1737 chars]

articles.author: Brenda Goodman
articles.title: Only about 1 in 4 American adults definitely wants the updated Covid-19 vaccine, new survey finds - CNN
articles.description: When it comes to getting the updated Covid-19 vaccines this year, only about 1 in 4 American adults say they definitely plan to get the shot, according to new survey findings from the nonprofit health policy group KFF. Roughly another quarter of adults say th…
